clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: 90 days notice period.

clauses.title: Liability Cap
clauses.summary: 12 months' fees limit.

insights.message: Liability cap excludes data breach costs.
Renewal auto-renews unless cancelled 60 days before expiry.

evidence.snippet: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees.

name: Cloud Services Agreement
parties: Amazon Web Services & Tech Innovations Inc

clauses.title: Data Ownership
clauses.summary: Customer retains all rights to their data.

clauses.title: Service Levels
clauses.summary: 99.9% uptime guarantee with financial credits.

insights.message: Data portability restrictions may cause vendor lock-in.
Force majeure clause is unusually broad.

evidence.snippet: Customer data will be returned in standard format upon termination.
Service credits are sole remedy for downtime events.

clauses.title: Usage Rights
clauses.summary: Enterprise-wide license for 250 users.

clauses.title: Audit Rights
clauses.summary: Vendor may audit usage once per year.

insights.message: Audit clause lacks limitations on scope and costs.
License includes all future updates during term.

evidence.snippet: Licensee shall provide access to systems for compliance verification.
List of authorized users and permitted installations.

clauses.title: Work Product
clauses.summary: Client owns all deliverables and IP.

clauses.title: Confidentiality
clauses.summary: Mutual NDA for 3 years post-termination.

insights.message: Change order process lacks clear pricing methodology.
Clear acceptance criteria for all deliverables.

evidence.snippet: All work product becomes property of Client upon payment.
Confidentiality obligations survive termination for 36 months.

clauses.title: Data Security
clauses.summary: SOC 2 compliance required with annual audits.

clauses.title: Breach Notification
clauses.summary: 72-hour notification requirement for incidents.

insights.message: Subprocessor changes require only website notification, not consent.
Data retention period exceeds regulatory requirements.

evidence.snippet: Technical and organizational security measures documentation.
Processor may engage new subprocessors by updating website list.

clauses.title: License Metrics
clauses.summary: Named User Plus licensing model for 500 users.

clauses.title: Support Services
clauses.summary: 24/7 support with 2-hour response time for critical issues.

insights.message: Unlimited audit rights with broad scope definition.
Price protection only for first renewal term.

evidence.snippet: Licensee shall maintain accurate records of all users and installations.
Support response times and escalation procedures.

clauses.title: Confidentiality Period
clauses.summary: 5 years protection for disclosed information.

clauses.title: Residuals Clause
clauses.summary: No residuals rights for receiving party.

insights.message: Unilateral NDA favors disclosing party in all aspects.
Clear exceptions for independently developed information.

evidence.snippet: Obligation of confidentiality shall survive for 5 years after disclosure.
Receiving party shall not use Confidential Information for any purpose other than evaluation.

clauses.title: Subscription Term
clauses.summary: Annual subscription with auto-renewal.

clauses.title: Data Export
clauses.summary: 30-day data retrieval period after termination.

insights.message: Data export functionality limited to certain formats.
Suspension rights are broad and unilateral.

evidence.snippet: Service may be suspended for any suspected violation of terms.
Customer data will be available for export for 30 days post-termination.

clauses.title: Termination for Convenience
clauses.summary: Either party may terminate with 90 days notice.

clauses.title: Limitation of Liability
clauses.summary: Cap of 12 months fees or $1M, whichever is greater.

insights.message: Most favored nation clause may limit future negotiations.
Clear dispute resolution process with escalation path.

evidence.snippet: Neither party shall be liable for indirect, special or consequential damages.
Change control procedures and approval requirements.

clauses.title: Acceptance Criteria
clauses.summary: 14-day testing period for each deliverable.

clauses.title: IP Ownership
clauses.summary: Client owns all custom-developed code and IP.

insights.message: Payment milestones not tied to specific acceptance criteria.
Warranties exclude third-party open source components.

evidence.snippet: Client shall have 14 business days to test and accept each deliverable.
Developer assigns all rights to work product to Client upon payment.

clauses.title: Service Credits
clauses.summary: 10% credit for uptime below 99.9%.

clauses.title: Data Location
clauses.summary: Primary storage in US region with optional EU backup.

insights.message: Data transfer mechanisms rely on outdated Privacy Shield framework.
Scheduled maintenance excluded from uptime calculations.

evidence.snippet: Service credits are Customer's sole and exclusive remedy for downtime.
Data may be transferred to countries with adequate protection measures.

clauses.title: Performance Metrics
clauses.summary: KPIs tied to customer acquisition costs.

clauses.title: Content Ownership
clauses.summary: Client owns all created marketing materials.

insights.message: Indemnification for IP infringement limited to direct damages only.
Clear approval process for all campaign materials.

evidence.snippet: Key performance indicators and measurement methodology.
Agency assigns all rights to deliverables upon full payment.
